original_solution_mapping.L1: If Yola currently weighs 220 pounds, then Wanda, who weighs 30 pounds more than Yola, weighs 220+30 = <<220+30=250>>250 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Wanda also weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed 250-80=<<250-80=170>>170 pounds 2 years ago.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 949.
    Returns: Yola's weight 2 years ago.
    """
    # L1
    yola_current_weight = 220 # currently weighs 220 pounds
    wanda_more_than_yola_current = 30 # weighs 30 pounds more than Yola currently
    wanda_current_weight = yola_current_weight + wanda_more_than_yola_current

    # L2
    wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago = 80 # weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago
    yola_weight_two_years_ago = wanda_current_weight - wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago

    # FA
    answer = yola_weight_two_years_ago
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If Yola currently weighs {yola_current_weight} pounds, then Wanda, who weighs {wanda_more_than_yola_current} pounds more than Yola, weighs {yola_current_weight}+{wanda_more_than_yola_current} = <<{yola_current_weight}+{wanda_more_than_yola_current}={wanda_current_weight}>>{wanda_current_weight} pounds.

Wanda also weighs {wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago} pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed {wanda_current_weight}-{wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago}=<<{wanda_current_weight}-{wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago}={yola_weight_two_years_ago}>>{yola_weight_two_years_ago} pounds 2 years ago.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: If Yola currently weighs 220 pounds, then Wanda, who weighs 30 pounds more than Yola, weighs 220+30 = <<220+30=250>>250 pounds.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Wanda also weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed 220-80=<<220-80=140>>140 pounds 2 years ago.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'yola_current_weight' (value: 220) was used instead of 'wanda_current_weight' (value: 250).
